io.permazen.test

Class TestSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.permazen.test.TestSupport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KVTestSupport

    public abstract class TestSupport
extends Object
    Base class for unit tests providing logging and random seed setup.
